title: Commending Firefighter Howard Mosher upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition after 51 years of dedicated service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  Firefighter  Howard Mosher upon the
occasion of his designation for special recognition after  51  years  of
dedicated service to the West Glens Falls Volunteer Fire Company

WHEREAS,  The firefighters of New York State are renowned throughout the
Nation; their reputation is synonymous with excellence  in  the  arduous
field of fire protection and prevention; and
  WHEREAS,  Since  the  early  days  of "teapot steamers," the volunteer
firefighter has been the cornerstone of our great  Nation's  efforts  to
spare us from the ravages of fire; and
  WHEREAS,  This Legislative Body is proud to commend Firefighter Howard
Mosher upon the occasion of  his  designation  for  special  recognition
after  51  years  of dedicated service to the West Glens Falls Volunteer
Fire Company, to be celebrated on Friday, January 14, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Volunteer firefighters and fire departments not only  provide
the  critical service of fire protection but also engage in other activ-
ities of great benefit and importance to the communities they serve; and
  WHEREAS, A Past Captain of the Fire Police, Howard Mosher's sacrifices
and his selfless dedication merit tribute and recognition by  all  citi-
zens of West Glens Falls; and
  WHEREAS, It takes a special dedication, a strong desire to help others
and  a  tireless sense of community to forsake precious time with family
and friends to respond to the signal that a neighbor is in need;  Howard
Mosher  is  such  a firefighter; throughout 51 years of devoted service,
this volunteer heroically performed, above and beyond the call of  duty,
those  responsibilities  which  define the task of fire protection; now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend  Firefighter  Howard Mosher upon the occasion of his designation
for special recognition after 51 years of dedicated service to the  West
Glens Falls Volunteer Fire Company; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Firefighter Howard Mosher.
